meanings.definition: A structure that supports or receives the thrust of an arch or bridge.
meanings.sent1: The abutment of the bridge held up the weight of the entire structure.
meanings.sent2: The architect carefully designed the abutment to ensure the stability of the bridge.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel thought the abutment was a perfect spot to hide its acorns.
meanings.sent4: Her unwavering support acted as an abutment for him during tough times.
meanings.sent5: The massive abutment loomed over the river, a testament to human engineering.

meanings.definition: The point at which two things are joined together.
meanings.sent1: The abutment of the puzzle pieces was crucial to completing the picture.
meanings.sent2: The abutment of the two roads created a busy intersection in the city.
meanings.sent3: The abutment of flavors in the dish created a unique and delicious taste.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was the strong abutment that held their bond together.
meanings.sent5: The abutment of the two fabrics resulted in a beautiful patchwork quilt.
